title: telugu velagu
sahitya:
telugu velagu kiraNAlu manaku manade mAniki navaratnAbharaNAlu


anupallavi

  velitilEni kalimitO melakuvagala pAlanatO kalatalEni manasutO kalakAlam melagAli


caraNam    annamunaku Andhramu AdaraNaku aravamu kannatalli kannaDamu 
malayAnilamu malayALamu manamantA okaTaitE manugaDa prashAntamu
